name: Carhartt First Responder Discount
description: 15% off workwear for verified first responders
fullDescription: Carhartt offers first responders a 15% discount on workwear and apparel with ID.me verification at checkout.
whatTheyOffer:
- 15% off all Carhartt products
- Applies to workwear, jackets, pants, accessories
- Online purchases at carhartt.com
- Combinable with some promotions
- Year-round discount
howToGetIt:
1. Visit carhartt.com
2. Add items to cart
3. At checkout, verify through ID.me
4. Eligible: firefighters, EMTs, police, paramedics
5. 15% discount applied automatically
keywords: Carhartt, first responder discount, workwear, 15% off, firefighter, police, EMT, ID.me
